add_subdirectory(argparse)

option(FMT_DOC OFF)
option(FMT_TEST OFF)
option(FMT_INSTALL OFF)
add_subdirectory(fmt)

add_library(icecream INTERFACE)
target_include_directories(icecream INTERFACE icecream-scoped-include)

option(LIEF_USE_CCACHE "" OFF)
option(LIEF_PYTHON_API "" OFF)
option(LIEF_C_API "" OFF)
option(LIEF_EXAMPLES "" OFF)
option(LIEF_LOGGING "" ON)
option(LIEF_LOGGING_DEBUG "" ON)
option(LIEF_ENABLE_JSON "" OFF)
option(LIEF_ELF "" OFF)
option(LIEF_PE "" OFF)
option(LIEF_MACHO "" ON)
option(LIEF_DEX "" OFF)
option(LIEF_ART "" OFF)
add_subdirectory(LIEF)
